skills.name: Gale
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 25s] Releases a tornado traveling in a zigzag path, sending enemies along the path airborne and dealing 222 Ice DMG multiple times. Enemies hit will suffer 80% slower Move Speed and Attack Speed for 1.79s.

skills.name: Tailwind
skills.description: Hits against enemies have a 4.9% chance of accelerating Move Speed by 98% for 4.5s. CD: 10s.
